description: Excavation to create bike store at lower ground floor level under front garden. Construction of lower ground floor side return extension, set back from closet wing by one brick. Construction of ground floor glazed rear extension to 1/3 depth of closet wing. Addition of roof lights to proposed lower ground floor extension. Addition of window to closet wing flank wall. Replacement of closet wing pitched roof with a flat parapet roof to match height of neighbouring property. Replacement of 2no. dormer windows on rear elevation with replica windows. Insertion of AOV roof light at roof level. Insertion of bathroom roof light at roof level. Replacements of windows with double glazed timber sash windows to match existing. Replacement of front door to match existing. External landscaping to rear garden. Internal reconfigurations throughout.
